mil5.5.4:1.2: ‘tathāgato bhikkhave, arahaṁ sammāsambuddho anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā’ti.
mil5.5.4:1.4: ‘addasaṁ khvāhaṁ, bhikkhave, purāṇaṁ maggaṁ purāṇaṁ añjasaṁ pubbakehi sammāsambuddhehi anuyātan’ti.
mil5.5.4:1.5_0: Yadi, bhante nāgasena, tathāgato anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā, tena hi ‘addasaṁ
mil5.5.4:1.5_1: khvāhaṁ, bhikkhave, purāṇaṁ maggaṁ purāṇaṁ añjasaṁ pubbakehi sammāsambuddhehi anuyātan’ti
mil5.5.4:1.7_0: ‘addasaṁ khvāhaṁ, bhikkhave, purāṇaṁ maggaṁ purāṇaṁ añjasaṁ pubbakehi sammāsambuddhehi
mil5.5.4:1.7_1: anuyātan’ti, tena hi ‘tathāgato, bhikkhave, arahaṁ sammāsambuddho anuppannassa maggassa
mil5.5.4:1.8: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
mil5.5.4:2.2: ‘tathāgato, bhikkhave, arahaṁ sammāsambuddho anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā’ti.
mil5.5.4:2.4_0: ‘addasaṁ khvāhaṁ, bhikkhave, purāṇaṁ maggaṁ purāṇaṁ añjasaṁ pubbakehi sammāsambuddhehi
mil5.5.4:2.4_1: anuyātan’ti, taṁ dvayampi sabhāvavacanameva, pubbakānaṁ, mahārāja, tathāgatānaṁ antaradhānena
mil5.5.4:2.4_2: asati anusāsake maggo antaradhāyi, taṁ tathāgato maggaṁ luggaṁ paluggaṁ gūḷhaṁ pihitaṁ
mil5.5.4:2.4_3: paṭicchannaṁ asañcaraṇaṁ paññācakkhunā sampassamāno addasa pubbakehi sammāsambuddhehi
mil5.5.4:2.5: ‘addasaṁ khvāhaṁ, bhikkhave, purāṇaṁ maggaṁ purāṇaṁ añjasaṁ pubbakehi sammāsambuddhehi anuyātan’ti.
mil5.5.4:3.1: Pubbakānaṁ, mahārāja, tathāgatānaṁ antaradhānena asati anusāsake luggaṁ paluggaṁ gūḷhaṁ pihitaṁ paṭicchannaṁ asañcaraṇaṁ maggaṁ yaṁ dāni tathāgato sañcaraṇaṁ akāsi, taṅkāraṇā āha—
mil5.5.4:3.2: ‘tathāgato, bhikkhave, arahaṁ sammāsambuddho anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā’ti.
mil5.5.4:4.1_0: Idha, mahārāja, rañño cakkavattissa antaradhānena maṇiratanaṁ girisikhantare nilīyati,
mil5.5.4:4.1_1: aparassa cakkavattissa sammāpaṭipattiyā upagacchati, api nu kho taṁ, mahārāja, maṇiratanaṁ tassa pakatan”ti?
mil5.5.4:4.2: “Na hi, bhante, pākatikaṁyeva taṁ maṇiratanaṁ, tena pana nibbattitan”ti.
mil5.5.4:4.3_0: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, pākatikaṁ pubbakehi tathāgatehi anuciṇṇaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ sivaṁ
mil5.5.4:4.3_1: maggaṁ asati anusāsake luggaṁ paluggaṁ gūḷhaṁ pihitaṁ paṭicchannaṁ asañcaraṇaṁ bhagavā
mil5.5.4:4.3_2: paññācakkhunā sampassamāno uppādesi, sañcaraṇaṁ akāsi, taṅkāraṇā āha—
mil5.5.4:4.4: ‘tathāgato, bhikkhave, arahaṁ sammāsambuddho anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā’ti.
mil5.5.4:5.1: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, santaṁyeva puttaṁ yoniyā janayitvā mātā ‘janikā’ti vuccati;
mil5.5.4:5.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, tathāgato santaṁyeva maggaṁ luggaṁ paluggaṁ gūḷhaṁ pihitaṁ paṭicchannaṁ asañcaraṇaṁ paññācakkhunā sampassamāno uppādesi, sañcaraṇaṁ akāsi, taṅkāraṇā āha—
mil5.5.4:5.3: ‘tathāgato, bhikkhave, arahaṁ sammāsambuddho anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā’ti.
mil5.5.4:6.1: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, koci puriso yaṁ kiñci naṭṭhaṁ passati, ‘tena taṁ bhaṇḍaṁ nibbattitan’ti jano voharati;
mil5.5.4:6.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, tathāgato santaṁyeva maggaṁ luggaṁ paluggaṁ gūḷhaṁ pihitaṁ paṭicchannaṁ asañcaraṇaṁ paññācakkhunā sampassamāno uppādesi, sañcaraṇaṁ akāsi, taṅkāraṇā āha—
mil5.5.4:6.3: ‘tathāgato, bhikkhave, arahaṁ sammāsambuddho anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā’ti.
mil5.5.4:7.1: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, koci puriso vanaṁ sodhetvā bhūmiṁ nīharati, ‘tassa sā bhūmī’ti jano voharati, na cesā bhūmi tena pavattitā, taṁ bhūmiṁ kāraṇaṁ katvā bhūmisāmiko nāma hoti;
mil5.5.4:7.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, tathāgato santaṁyeva maggaṁ luggaṁ paluggaṁ gūḷhaṁ pihitaṁ paṭicchannaṁ asañcaraṇaṁ paññāya sampassamāno uppādesi, sañcaraṇaṁ akāsi, taṅkāraṇā āha—
mil5.5.4:7.3: ‘tathāgato, bhikkhave, arahaṁ sammāsambuddho anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā’”ti.
